dict.string:
on alfred_script(cmd) # Launch Wezterm if needed (Appname is `WezTerm`, processname is `wezterm-gui`) tell application "WezTerm" to activate tell application "System Events" repeat while (name of first application process whose frontmost is true) is not "wezterm-gui" delay 0.05 end repeat end tell
do shell script ("echo '" & cmd & "' | wezterm cli send-text --no-paste") end alfred_script
